author: mturk
msg: Add max_busy count to give the user an option to see what was
the maximum number of concurrent connections to Tomcat.

author: mturk
msg: Added worker.maintain directive that allows customizing default 10

author: remm
msg: - Optimize a little using a direct byte buffer to replace the socket buffer.
- I'll experiment with doing the same optimization for reads, but I don't expect it to do anything
(other than waste memory) as copying bytes will be needed.

author: remm
msg: - Disable sendfile if not supported, as submitted by Bill and Mladen.
